DanceOfEvolution.DialogueNodeDef.text: The envoy stares at your people with dead, empty eyes and speaks in a monotone voice that almost sounds like a low, mechanical growl. "We are the Mycelyss, we have taken notice of the psychic emanations of this colony as a sign that more live here. This mycelyss colony is underdevelopped and weak. We are established and strong. It is in your best interest to become a symbiote of us. You will be assimilated into a stronger organism. Comply now."

li.text: Ridiculous, we would never submit to the likes of you!
Your colony is weaker than ours, join us or be consumed. Comply now.

DanceOfEvolution.DialogueNodeDef.text: "Affirmative. Our collective is in need of living humans for processing. Give us 2 immediately. Noncompliance will be considered rebellion and will be dealt with swiftly. Comply now."
"Affirmative. Your suggestion will be processed to assertain its truth. We will come to a conclusion shortly, goodbye."
